channel.title: My server still isnt up.... READ THIS PLEASE!
channel.description:
* NO THIS IS NOT ADVERTISING * hi, im trying to get my server, Holyskies. i follow all the instructions yet it still doesnt work! 1: i have no-ip *i set it all up and stuff* 2: its checkmarked 3: i have portforwarded...ed 4: Run.bat is up 5: no-ip is up
i might of forgot some stuff i put up there... but if someone can find out what i did wrong pm me, i really need help =\ thanks, ---Xx1 pk3r 1xX---- PS: pm me please. i wont check this thread much.

item.title: My server still isnt up.... READ THIS PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

I know that All too well… not like it killed my comp… but i had it for a bit, my dad showed me what could happen… THANK GOD ITS GONE[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2008, 08:47:14 pm[/size][hr]anyone have belkin? if so, in the vertual servers, am i supposed to have my complete server name in the name thing? or i could just have anything[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2008, 09:07:52 pm[/size][hr]well i gotta go to bed, pm me with some help. Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 02:31:31 pm[/size][hr]ok, post with help please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 02:33:20 pm[/size][hr]help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 06:00:15 pm[/size][hr]ALMOST HAD IT D=

item.source: My server still isnt up.... READ THIS PLEASE!

item.title: My server still isnt up.... READ THIS PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @trivenge trivenge
item.description:
@trivenge wrote:

fallen_angel666:

nope =\ still doesnt work… i dont understand why its not working. i have a belkin router, it allows the ports, yet its still not working… w8 a second, it took some time… so i need to wait a bit for it to start working?

nah you shouldnt have to wait, maybe you just need to go into firewall settings and appropriately apply it.

If its still not working, try using utorrent instead of your router as a portforward

download it here

ww.utorrent.com

install and go to options, change the port to the default etc.

apply

then exit
start server
restart utorrent

tell me if that works

Read full topic

item.title: My server still isnt up.... READ THIS PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

[quote=“fallen_angel666, post:7, topic:235569”]HAH, im not too sure, thanks for pointing that out. ill check it out now =P[quote author=ziplock link=topic=310660.msg2479061#msg2479061 date=1223423709]
Huum, did you unblock the port from all your firewalls including your routers firewall?
[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2008, 08:04:27 pm[/size][hr]alright i fixed it, im going to test my server now… hope it works[/quote]
Yes, that is what kept me from getting mine running… you need to allow it through your router. I’m not sure you did it right. I did something wrong when I was port forwarding. I would think there was nothing wrong and there was. The router was the only problem.

Read full topic
